data.title: NIO to USD: Convert Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros to US Dollars
data.meta_description: Use the NIO to USD currency converter at Exchange-Rates.org for accurate and up-to-date exchange rates. Easily convert Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros to US Dollars with real-time data.
data.text:
Frequently Asked Question about NIO to USD

How much is 1 Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro in US Dollars?

1 Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro = 0.02727 US Dollars as of August 17, 2024 10:55 PM UTC. You can get live exchange rates between Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros and US Dollars using exchange-rates.org, which aggregates real-time forex data from the most authoritative sources.

How much is 100 Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros in US Dollars?

As of August 17, 2024 10:55 PM UTC, 100 Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros is equivalent to 2.7268 US Dollars. The exchange rate at this time is 0.02727 US Dollars per Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro.

What was the highest NIO to USD exchange rate in the last 10 years?

In the last 10 years, the highest rate from Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros to US Dollars was on April 6, 2015 when each Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro was worth 0.03810 US Dollars.

When is the best time to convert NIO to USD?

The NIO and USD can be traded 24x5, starting from the time markets open on Monday mornings in Sydney until they close on Fridays at 5 PM in New York. Exchange rates can fluctuate by the minute while markets are open. However, the period between 3-4 PM GMT is often a good time to convert Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros to US Dollars because currency market liquidity and trading volume tend to be the highest during this time. Additionally, it's advisable to convert Nicaraguan Cordoba Oros to US Dollars early in the week if you need USD urgently. Executing a trade late in the week might result in a delayed settlement until the following week, as forex markets are closed on weekends.

Which is stronger, the Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro or the US Dollar?

The US Dollar is currently stronger than the Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro, as 1 USD is equal to 36.673 NIO. Conversely, 1 NIO is worth 0.02727 USD.

Is the Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro up or down against the US Dollar?

The Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro has increased +0.08% year-to-date against the US Dollar. Over the past 10 years, the Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro has declined -27.47% against the US Dollar. Consequently, the Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro has lost purchasing power compared to the US Dollar over the last decade.

What's the best NIO to USD exchange rate today?

As of August 17, 2024 10:55 PM UTC, the best NIO to USD exchange rate is 0.02727 USD. This means that for every Nicaraguan Cordoba Oro you exchange, you will receive 0.02727 US Dollars.
